bioconda.name: strelka
bioconda.summary: Strelka calls somatic and germline small variants from mapped sequencing reads

biocontainers.name: strelka
biocontainers.summary: Strelka is an analysis package designed to detect somatic snvs and small indels from the aligned sequencing reads of matched tumor-normal samples.

biotools.summary: Strelka is an analysis package designed to detect somatic SNVs and small indels from the aligned sequencing reads of matched tumor-normal samples.

bioschemas.name: Strelka
bioschemas.summary: Strelka is an analysis package designed to detect somatic SNVs and small indels from the aligned sequencing reads of matched tumor-normal samples.
